title: pixel 3 reboot loop
content:
My pixel 3 is in a reboot loop since yesterday afternoon. 
I was using the camera and then it restarted, and since then it's stuck. Sometimes it gets into the homescreen, but usually not, and it reboots before I can do anything.
I have tried using power & volume buttons to try to restart into a different mode, but when the menu comes up, if I press the volume button to cycle through options, it just restarts again. It's always on fastboot mode when I get into the menu, and I can't switch to anything else.
I have had the phone since August 2019, so I don't think it's under warranty. 
I didn't download any new apps recently. There's no water damage AFAIK. In the past few weeks I was getting prompted to delete files to free up storage space (I think I had ~2GB left).
Any suggestions on how to get my phone working again? 
TIA
